name: PrivateBin

name: Focalboard

description: You're Santa, it's Christmas, and you have 6 billion gifts to deliver. Will you make it in time?
name: Giftrun

description: Element (formerly known as Vector and Riot) is a Matrix web client built using the Matrix React SDK

name: Rustpad

description: Bibliogram is a website that takes data from Instagram's public profile views and puts it into a friendlier page that loads faster, gives downloadable images, eliminates ads, generates RSS feeds, and doesn't urge you to sign up
name: Bibliogram

description: With TeamSpeak there are no centralized servers and no harvesting of personal data. Your chat, your data, your choice. With TeamSpeak, your team rules!
name: Teamspeak

description: A brutal exploration and survival game for 1-10 players, set in a procedurally-generated purgatory inspired by viking culture. Battle, build, and conquer your way to a saga worthy of Odin’s patronage!
name: Valheim

compose.name: valheim
compose.description: The Valheim Container - Use Server Port 39870 to Connect!

userEnvironmentParameters.name: NAME
userEnvironmentParameters.description: The name of your Valheim server

userEnvironmentParameters.name: PASSWORD
userEnvironmentParameters.description: The password of your Valheim server

description: Host your Minecraftt server on the Flux Cloud
name: Minecraft

userEnvironmentParameters.name: SEED
userEnvironmentParameters.description: If you want to create the Minecraft level with a specific Seed (only Positive Numbers)
userEnvironmentParameters.placeholder: Put in a random Number, e.g 1785852800490497919

userEnvironmentParameters.name: DIFFICULTY
userEnvironmentParameters.description: The difficulty level can be set like peaceful, easy, normal, and hard

userEnvironmentParameters.name: TYP
userEnvironmentParameters.description: What kind of server typ do you want, refer to https://github.com/itzg/docker-minecraft-server/blob/master/README.md
userEnvironmentParameters.placeholder: Enter your server typ here, e.g CATSERVER
